name: Yet Another Zombie Game (mixthewiz)
description:
I made this game mostly following this tutorial. https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list... All the shooting mechanics are from that tutorial. Menu System is from this tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oIytj... And some extra stuff that I added. I started learning Unreal Engine, 3 months ago, this project took about 6 days. You can download the game from the itch. Unfortunately, I can't share the project files because I have some paid assets. But if you follow the tutorials I linked You can create something similar.

Added; footstep sounds, sprint mechanic, pause menu, death screen, and head bobbing.

Tried to increase performance but I think I made it even worse lol.

But if you lower the resolution it feels like you are playing world at war zombies in 2010 with a CRT TV so that's actually deliberate.

WASD to Move

Mouse to look around

Left mouse to shoot

Right Mouse to ADS

R for reloading

Left shit Sprinting

Tab for pausing the game if you can call it that.
